result.title: Welcome!
result.content:
Hi top AIPO students!

Welcome to the offical AIPO Codeforces Training Group. We will set weekly competitions here for you to try. New to 2017. Contests must be completed as a 'Virtual Contest'. You will have roughly 2/3 hours to complete 5 problems. The clock starts as soon as you start the contest.

Gary & Ximo
